dod-special-compensation.title: Combat-Related Special Compensation (CRSC)
dod-special-compensation.headline: Combat-Related Special Compensation (CRSC)
dod-special-compensation.source.name: Department of Defense
dod-special-compensation.summary: Combat-Related Special Compensation (CRSC) program provides a special monthly payment equivalent to the offset to military retired pay due to receipt of VA disability compensation determined to be combat-related.
dod-special-compensation.eligibility.lab: You served in the active military, naval or air service.
